name: THE BALLAD OF THE REALLY ENTHUSIASTIC BUT ACTUALLY TOTALLY CRAP WIZARD
name_original: THE BALLAD OF THE REALLY ENTHUSIASTIC BUT ACTUALLY TOTALLY CRAP WIZARD
description:
Made for TriJam #148, with the theme Inconvenient Superpower,

by Risky Business Games: LarsIslander and Wobbling

Superpower: You have a magic wand!
Inconvenience: You have no idea how to use it.

Controls:

  • WASD: movement
  • Mouse: aim
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot a random spell

Spells:

  • deal damage to the gelatinous cubes
  • duplicate the  gelatinous cubes
  • make the  gelatinous cubes bigger
  • change the colour of the  gelatinous cubes
  • ricochet around all over the place dealing damage
  • misfire and punt you backwards
  • hit and punt the  gelatinous cubes into space
